name: Super Indie Dev Bro
description:
The time has come... to make some games!

Super Indie Dev Bro is a resource management action game. Sleep, Make games, play with your Doggo and ship your game!

Left click on your Computer to work!
Left click on the Fridge to feed yourself. Om nom.
Left click on Doggo for some soothing times. Doggo needs to sleep at night!
Left click on the Bed to rest. What's that? Sleep during the day? Day's for work!
